articles.author: Silvia Amaro
articles.title: Euro zone core inflation slows unexpectedly in April, blurring the picture for rate hikes - CNBC
articles.description: Inflation in the euro zone rose in April, according to preliminary data released Tuesday, remaining significantly above levels targeted by the European Central Bank.
